Package integration.project

Class Character

java.lang.Object
integration.project.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Palico
public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
Character object, where the player character, enemy, and palico functions are handled. Contains methods for handling actions, and building Character objects
Author:
Michael D'Agostino

      Returns:

    • useMeleeAction

      public int useMeleeAction​(int[][] charArrays, int attPos, int defPos)
      Use that object's Melee Action. Determine hit chance, then damage if hit chance is true.
      Parameters:
      charArrays - stat array
      attPos - where attacker is in array
      defPos - where defender is in array
      Returns:
      damage done to defender

    • useGunAction

      Parameters:

      defPos - where defender is in array
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • useRunAction

      public boolean useRunAction​(int[][] charArrays, int attPos, int defPos)
      Use the run action. Only used by player. If true, run successful, and battle ends without player death.
      Parameters:
      charArrays - stat array
      attPos - where attacker is in array
      defPos - where defender is in array
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not

    • getHitChance

      public boolean getHitChance​(int[][] charArrays, int attPos, int defPos)
      determines if attack hits depending on attacker and defender stats, + rng.
      Parameters:
      charArrays - stat array
      attPos - attacker position in array
      defPos - defender position in array
      Returns:
      true if hit successful, false if not

    • getBaseDamage

      public int getBaseDamage​(int[][] charArrays, int pos)
      Gets base damage by accumlating the total sum of SPECIAL stats in that char's array.
      Parameters:
      charArrays - stat array
      pos - where object is in array
      Returns:
      sum of SPECIAL stat points
